column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=After a long day of gardening , I came inside to wash my hands .
#text=While washing them , I glanced at myself in the mirror and realized that I was much dirtier than I thought .
#text=I figured I should take a bath before doing anything else so as to not soil anything in my home .
#text=I turned off the sink , dried my hands , and set off in search of a bath towel and a change of clothes .
#text=I decided on a bath as I had a long day and it sounded so much more relaxing .
#text=Once I had the items I needed , I went back to the bathroom and turned the tub on .
#text=I turned the hot and cold nozzles both , and adjusted them as needed after testing the temperature with my hand .
#text=Once the tub was half full I turned it off , as I knew my body weight would displace the water and cause the level to rise once I got in .
#text=I sat down in the perfectly warm water and relaxed .
#text=Once the water started cooling down , I decided to go ahead and wash myself .
#text=I poured some bodywash on a cloth and washed from the top down .
#text=Then , I rinsed and drained the tub and dried off .
